info.title: Quota Arrangement
info.description: This service helps you to create, read, update, and delete quota arrangements through an API call from a source system outside SAP S/4HANA Cloud or SAP S/4HANA. The service contains quota arrangement header and item. The information is sent in the request as a payload. The information is used when creating, reading or updating a quota arrangement, with appropriate checks for restricted values and authorizations.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update, and delete quota arrangements through an API call from a source system outside SAP S/4HANA Cloud or SAP S/4HANA

values.text: [Physical Inventory - Inventory Count and Adjustment(OML)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/OML " Link To BP ")

get.summary: Gets the header details of all the quota arrangements in the system
get.description: Gets the header details of all the quota arrangements in the system. Note that if there are many quota arrangements in the system, this operation might take a while.

post.description: Creates a quota arrangement header with non-overlapping validity periods for a material, plant combination.

parameters.name: QuotaArrangement
parameters.description: Number of quota arrangement

get.summary: Gets the header details of a quota arrangement
get.description: Gets the header details of a quota arrangement using quota arrangement number provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the header details of a quota arrangement
patch.description: Updates the header details of a quota arrangement, using the quota arrangement number provided. You can update the validity period only if the quota base quantity, "QuotaBaseQuantity", and allocated quantity "QuotaAllocatedQuantity" is "0".

delete.summary: Deletes the header of a quota arrangement
delete.description: Deletes the header of a quota arrangement using the quota arrangement number provided. You can delete a quota arrangement header only if there are no items in it.

parameters.name: QuotaArrangement
parameters.description: Number of quota arrangement

get.summary: Gets the item details of all the items in a quota arrangement
get.description: Gets the item details of all the items in a quota arrangement, using the quota arrangement number provided.

post.summary: Adds an item to a Quota Arrangement
post.description: Adds an item to a Quota Arrangement using the Quota Arrangement number provided. It is mandatory to pass the Quota Arrangement number, " Quota Arrangement ", in the request URL.

get.summary: Gets the item details of all the items, in all the quota arrangements in the system.
get.description: Gets the item details of all the items, in all the quota arrangements in the system. Note that if there are many quota arrangements in the system, this operation might take a while.

post.description: Adds an item to a Quota Arrangement using the Quota Arrangement number provided. It is mandatory to pass the Quota Arrangement number, " Quota Arrangement ", in the request body.

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
